entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 70 late this morning. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
